channel.title: Php on Index

item.title: Php script editing web app
item.description: https://www.upwork.com/jobs/PHP-Script-Editing-for-Web-Application_~021836323208307535770/?referrer_url_path=find_work_home We are seeking a skilled PHP developer to edit an existing script for our web application. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of PHP and experience in web application development. The project requires making modifications to enhance functionality and ensure optimal performance. If you are detail-oriented and can work independently, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of previous PHP projects you’ve worked on.

item.title: Control de temperatura
item.description: https://www.freelancer.com/projects/php/control-temperatura/details necesito un sistema que me permita llevar registros de temperatura y humedad, que cualquier empleado pueda realizar, los campos que requiero son nombre de quien toma la lectura, temperatura en grados centígrados, humedad hora y fecha, que permita al administrador revisar los registros en un calendario o en un panel de información
